warzone.service

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • warzone.service.GameEngine

  • public class GameEngine
extends Object
    Main game loop. Loop over each player for the assign reinforcements, issue orders, and execute orders main game loop phases

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GameEngine getGameEngine(GameContext p_gameContext)
      return the game engine if game engine is not created, then create a new game engine
      boolean isReadyToStart()
      This method will show whether the game can start.
      static void main(String[] args)
      This method is the entrance of the game.
      boolean play()
      If the game turn is greater than 100, the game will end.
      void setGamePhase(GamePhase p_gamePhase)
      change the current game phase

    • Method Detail

      • getGameEngine

        public static GameEngine getGameEngine(GameContext p_gameContext)
        return the game engine if game engine is not created, then create a new game engine
        Parameters:
        p_gameContext - the game context
        Returns:
        the game engine

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws IOException
        This method is the entrance of the game. It will initiate the game context and use command scanner to get the command of the player.
        Parameters:
        args - the parameters for Java Virtual Machine
        Throws:
        IOException - the exception of creating or deleting files

      • isReadyToStart

        public boolean isReadyToStart()
        This method will show whether the game can start.
        Returns:
        true if the game can start

      • setGamePhase

        public void setGamePhase(GamePhase p_gamePhase)
        change the current game phase
        Parameters:
        p_gamePhase - the given game phase

      • play

        public boolean play()
        If the game turn is greater than 100, the game will end.
        Returns:
        true if the game can end.
